name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension shows you NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the cosmos! Each day a different image or photograph of our fascinating universe is featured, along with a brief explanation written by a professional astronomer.
